documents:
Table 'audits' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, action, description, doneby, created_at, updated_at

Table 'categories' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, category_name, description, created_at, updated_at

Table 'concurrencies' overview:
- Key columns: id, iid
- Sample columns: id, state, location, model, serial_number, tag_number, user, date_of_purchase, grant, category
- Relationships: iid -> inventories.id

Table 'dcdistributions' overview:
- Key columns: id, item_id, sent_from, sent_to
- Sample columns: id, item_id, quantity_sent, date_sent, sent_from, sentfrom_state, sent_to, sentto_state, documents, remarks
- Relationships: item_id -> dctools.id; sent_from -> facilities.id; sent_to -> facilities.id

Table 'dcstocks' overview:
- Key columns: id, item_id
- Sample columns: id, item_id, quantity_remaining, created_at, updated_at
- Relationships: item_id -> dctools.id

Table 'dcsupplies' overview:
- Key columns: id, item_id
- Sample columns: id, item_id, quantity_supplied, date_supplied, supplied_to, supplier, batchno, remarks, created_at, updated_at
- Relationships: item_id -> dctools.id

Table 'dctools' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, tool_name, description, category, created_at, updated_at

Table 'dctoolutilizations' overview:
- Key columns: id, item_id, facility_id
- Sample columns: id, item_id, facility_id, dated_from, dated_to, quantity_used, benchmark, remarks, created_at, updated_at
- Relationships: facility_id -> facilities.id; item_id -> dctools.id

Table 'departments' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, department_name, facility, internal_location, description, created_at, updated_at

Table 'facilities' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, facility_name, facility_no, state, lga, town, address, phone_number, contact_person, created_at

Table 'failed_jobs' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, connection, queue, payload, exception, failed_at

Table 'files' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, filename, itemid, created_at, updated_at

Table 'inventories' overview:
- Key columns: id, item_id, department_id, unit_id, facility_id
- Sample columns: id, item_id, item_name, state, facility, assigned_to, description, serial_no, ihvn_no, tag_no
- Relationships: department_id -> departments.id; facility_id -> facilities.id; item_id -> items.id; unit_id -> units.id

Table 'inventoryspecs' overview:
- Key columns: id, itemid
- Sample columns: id, property, value, created_at, updated_at, itemid
- Relationships: itemid -> inventories.id

Table 'items' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, item_name, specifications, created_at, updated_at

Table 'migrations' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, migration, batch

Table 'movements' overview:
- Key columns: id, inventories_id
- Sample columns: id, inventories_id, from, to, from_user, to_user, reason, user_id, date_moved, file
- Relationships: inventories_id -> inventories.id

Table 'multifacilities' overview:
- Key columns: id, user_id, facility_id
- Sample columns: id, user_id, facility_id, created_at, updated_at
- Relationships: facility_id -> facilities.id; user_id -> users.id

Table 'password_resets' overview:
- Key columns: email
- Sample columns: email, token, created_at

Table 'purchases' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, itemid, quantity, costper, supplier, date_purchased, invoice_no, description, facility, internal_location

Table 'requests' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, item_name, quantity_requested, user_id, location, state, request_status, request_reason, comments, remarks

Table 'settings' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, organization_name, description, logo, address, phone_number, copyright, created_at, updated_at

Table 'stocks' overview:
- Key columns: id, item_id
- Sample columns: id, item_id, quantity_remaining, created_at, updated_at
- Relationships: item_id -> items.id

Table 'suppliers' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, supplier_name, company_name, phone_number, email, items, category, created_at, updated_at

Table 'supplies' overview:
- Key columns: id, item_id
- Sample columns: id, item_id, quantity_supplied, date_supplied, supplied_to, supplier, batchno, remarks, created_at, updated_at
- Relationships: item_id -> items.id

Table 'units' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, unit_name, department, facility, internal_location, description, created_at, updated_at

Table 'users' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, name, email, email_verified_at, password, phone_number, unit, department, facility, role
